Headline: CTA Train Tracker May Be Temporarily Unavailable
ShortDescription: Info from CTA Train Tracker may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is not affected.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Information from CTA Train Tracker SM may be temporarily unavailable due to planned maintenance. Train service is unaffected.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Clinton
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Clinton due to an unauthorized person on tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Clinton due to an unauthorized person on tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
